name: FAR WEST SIM
description:
*Game is in french

In Far West Sim you play as a bounty hunter traveling across many villages.

In the villages you will pick a bounty between 3 varying difficulties, each with a distinctive trait to help find the criminal. Once you make your way in the village, you will be able to visit the buildings and talk to the people you meet.

As the day advances, you will inevitably have to accuse one the villagers of being the criminal, succeed and earn money, fail and lose money. You can make your way to the next village and continue your adventure.

The game is completely text-based (all in french).

HOW TO PLAY

  1. Download and unzip the file.
  2. Launch GameJam2.sln with an editor
  3. Run the program

CONTROLS

  • Enter: Validate choice / Continue conversation
  • Numbers: Type the number of your choice

TEAM

  • Frédéric Brown Althot - Game Design, Programming
  • Gabriel Bradley - Game Design, Programming
  • Maxime Galarneau - Game Design, Narrative Design
  • Vincent St-Gelais Turcotte - Game Design, Narrative Design
